name: Blake Stone: Planet Strike
description: It's the 22nd century: Galactic travel is commonplace, peace is at hand, and the future looks bright - until Goldfire's plan to unleash an army of military mutants shocks the galaxy. Dr. Goldfire, a brilliant bio-scientist whose morbid research led to incredible genetic improvements in humanoids and aliens, has gone power crazy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 Memory: 2 GB RAM

reviews.review_text: This is a old school Wolfenstein clone. If that sounds good for you by all means have fun. For me it's a game that aged well and I couldn't bring myself to stay with it very long.
